name: THR - The Hacker Revolt
description:
The Hacker Revolt is a project that I've been developing for a long time.
The game is about a hacker who wants revenge on the last company he worked for, and also to discover some mysteries behind it.

The game is still in alpha, so please understand that there can be several bugs and that many things can change over time.

I hope you like my game and have fun! <3

Please if you have any ideas/bug report, comment in this page so i can improve the game. :)
